channel.title: Adding npcs

item.title: Adding npcs
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

u add in autospawn

ull see this

spawn = 2821 3236 2910 0 0 0 0 0 1 Zeke

the first number is id, 2nd and 3rd are coords, and the “1” is the way its facing… if u get java.lang error… the numbers arent 1 space apart.
